plot: John, an Albanian from the Bronx, visits his motherland eager to wed a native bride, only to learn that he must first restore the family's honor by settling a blood feud. John yearns to be married, but can he really pull the trigger?
title: Një Sy Mbyllur
plot_es: John, an Albanian from the Bronx, visits his motherland eager to wed a native bride, only to learn that he must first restore the family's honor by settling a blood feud. John yearns to be married, but can he really pull the trigger?
plot_en: John, an Albanian from the Bronx, visits his motherland eager to wed a native bride, only to learn that he must first restore the family's honor by settling a blood feud. John yearns to be married, but can he really pull the trigger?
